body:
Abrahm,

Thanks for your reply, the problem as I found in this discussion is that radiance does not take into account azimuth, which is fundamental to create a Waldram diagram [https://radiance-online.lbl.gov:447/pipermail/radiance-general/2014...](https://radiance-online.lbl.gov:447/pipermail/radiance-general/2014-December/010650.html)
